title: duelbits
author: duelbits
created_time: November 16, 2022, 03:41:23 PMLast edit: November 17, 2022, 04:57:19 PM by duelbits
content: https://youtu.be/5JJ2L87hBYcAre you ready for the World Cup? Show your football knowledge and take part in Duelbits’ World Cup Predictor. You could win up to $100k! It‘s free to play, simply enter your predictions for each match.  Duelbits is the regional betting sponsor of the Argentine Football Association and Official European Betting Partner of Aston Villa.Use the following link to play for free & win for real:https://duelbits.com/150k-worldcup-giveaway

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.created_time: November 16, 2022, 04:25:14 PMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 06:44:41 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I want to believe that the prediction contest is not live yet since the page shared is reporting "COMING SOON"And aside this, i also have this pop up with the message ..Quote"An error occurred, 403 forbidden, we are sorry but you does not have access right to the requested resources"Mind explaining what this means please?, you can also refer to the screenshot of the page with the error pop up below.

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: I think Duelbits has solved the problem in the meantime. The promotion is displayed for me when I go to the page. I would just test it again. Maybe it works for you now too.

comments.author: LDL
comments.created_time: November 16, 2022, 05:16:13 PMLast edit: November 16, 2022, 05:40:13 PM by LDL
comments.body: DuelBits  has organized a football predictor focusing on the 2022 Qatar Football World Cup. I have already opened an account and predicated for a few matches.Join this game soon as free participation will stop on the 20th.  So those who are willing participate in the 100k dollar prize pool for a limited time.

comments.author: NicNacCoin
comments.created_time: November 16, 2022, 05:50:40 PMLast edit: November 16, 2022, 11:35:14 PM by NicNacCoin
comments.body: Duelbits has already offered a $100k prize pool for the World Cup in Qatar. All of you can participate here.You can make predictions here and if your prediction matches with that prediction then you will be the winning candidate there. But here I am predicting Qatar and Ecuador to see if I can win. And you participate in predictions very quickly.

comments.author: Ludmilla_rose1995
comments.body: this is really interesting, more and more gambling sites are doing promotions during this world cup. I'm wondering if this is just a test because I was asked to login and the login button can't work even though I've entered the site.

comments.author: rendravolt
comments.body: I signed up for an account on duelbits to simultaneously enter the prediction contest to win the $100k prize pool world cup 2022 Qatar and it went very smoothly. I have filled in several guesses for the scores for each country that competed, for the scorer of the first goal, of course I took the name Cody Gakpo, moreover he is the current top scorer in the Eredivisie league. Hopefully my prediction is correct and accurate.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Thanks Duelbits for organizing this contest. I am in also and hopefully somebody for the forum will get lucky and win a prize! Chances to win the top prize is very small as predicting the outcome of a soccermatch merely depends on pure luck.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: I thought this is something else like a service when I read the title. It is because of the word predictor that made me think it's someone who will give predictions on a match but after reading op and knowing the one who posted it then that's when I know that it's an event if say about it. This is kind of interesting competing against other predictor and have a chance to win 100k. Too bad I can't participate and it's few days left before it is closed. I think it's more than 1 round.

comments.author: Haunebu
comments.body: Great stuff Duelbits. I have observed similar promotions in various sites like Bet365, Sportsbet.io etc which is epic since I enjoy the fun aspect despite the low odds of winning these mini-lotteries.Free entry is another great aspect. Let's see if anyone from this forum can somehow win this insane prize.

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: Exactly how this works? Like we all put our predictions to specific result based on the event and whenever that even happens we get distributed prices for that? For example in live Match if I predict X team will make 2 goals in next 15 minutes and 100 others might have chosen the same option then does it mean the final price will be divided and we will get ratio of it? If yes then, what are the distribution criteria for this? Like Will there be Duelbits time weight wagerer which will make me eligible for higher ratio if I predict first etc? I mean there are few casinos whose using this strategy. It helps grow the competition and wary participations very fast and dominant.
